          <title>
            <string language="en">Moving heat energy in liquids and gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegliche Wärmeenergie in den Flüssigkeiten und
in den Gasen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie calorifique mobile en liquides et gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia de calor movente nos líquidos e nos 
gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia termica commovente in liquidi e gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κινούμενη ενέργεια θερμότητας στα υγρά και τα αέρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía térmica móvil en líquidos y gases</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the rise (top image) and fall (bottom image) of water particles depending on its temperature.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Anstieg (oberes Bild) 
und Fall (unteres Bild) der Wasserpartikel abhängig von seiner 
Temperatur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'élévation (image 
supérieure) et la chute (image inférieure) des particules de l'eau 
selon sa température.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a ascensão (imagem 
superior) e a queda (imagem inferior) de partículas da água 
dependendo de sua temperatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'aumento (immagine 
superiore) e la caduta (immagine inferiore) delle particelle 
dell'acqua secondo la relativa temperatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την άνοδο (κορυφαία 
εικόνα) και πτώση (κατώτατη εικόνα) των μορίων ύδατος ανάλογα 
με τη θερμοκρασία της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la subida (imagen 
superior) y la caída (imagen inferior) de las partículas del agua 
dependiendo de su temperatura.</string>
          </description>
